channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2024040023
item.description:
Report X-2024040023

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-04T15:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-25
  • City: GRANITE FALLS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PERSON UNLOADING THE TRAILER AT THE VERY END NOTICED A BOX THAT WAS LEAKING AT THE BACK CORNER. NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR AND PROCEEDED TO CLEAN UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE

item.title: Report E-2024040011
item.description:
Report E-2024040011

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-03T15:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-19
  • City: FRIDLEY
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO contacted ERTS to report a 1-gallon release of regulated UN3082 "CPI 6976 - DSM" that is located at Terminal XMP. The caller stated that (1) a 55-gallon metal drum was punctured by a nail in its pallet impacting Trailer #317-2716.
